titles.title: Reclaiming Our American Dollars Act
To use unexpended stimulus funds to replenish the Highway Trust Fund.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Appropriations.

bill.summary: 3/25/2010--Introduced. Reclaiming Our American Dollars Act - Requires the transfer to the Highway Trust Fund of unobligated balances of the discretionary appropriations (stimulus funds) made available by division A of the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009 (P.L. 111-5), except specified appropriations for: (1) the Department of the Army, Corps of Engineers-Civil; or (2) the Department of Transportation (DOT).
